Ben

Hi Ben, thanks for the feedback. We are targeting to include the topic "How To: Create a New Solution" in the next drop.
The basic idea behind this topic is to explain the user how to set up a basic solution for Prism. The procedure outline will probably look like this (subject to change):

- Create a new solution
- Add a Shell project (WPF Application) and a Common class library project.
- Add references to Prism assemblies in the Shell and the Common project.
- Add utility classes to Common (like a static class to hold Command references)
- Add a Bootstraper class to the Common project or in the Shell project, and implement it.
- Write code in App.xaml.cs to set up the bootstrapper and initialize it.
- Set up the Shell
